entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a person that Harry sometimes makes detours to find, but he hasn't done anything out of the ordinary yet. He also vanishes from the map at times.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who has Quidditch practice, homework, and is being followed by Cormac McLaggen and Lavender Brown.

entities.name: cormac mclaggen
entities.description: Cormac McLaggen is a person who keeps up a constant stream of hints that he would make a better permanent Keeper for the team than Ron, and provides Harry with detailed training schemes.

entities.name: lavender brown
entities.description: Lavender Brown is a person who keeps sidling up to Harry to discuss something.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone that Cormac McLaggen thinks would be replaced by him as the Keeper for the team.

entities.name: map
entities.description: The map is a location where Malfoy sometimes vanishes from.

relationships.description: Harry makes detours to find Malfoy.
Cormac McLaggen follows Harry wherever he goes.
